comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

I clicked on a link that is set to be opened in a new tab (or in a new window since my fox is trained to open them in a new tab by default)


Actual results:

The new tab display my "home" page. It appears to be random.


Expected results:

It should have opened the link I clicked on. I tried deactivating the NewTabURL, in case this was the problem but that was not it.

Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

I clicked on a link that is set to be opened in a new tab (or in a new window since my fox is trained to open them in a new tab by default)


Actual results:

The new tab display my "home" page. It appears to be random.


Expected results:

It should have opened the link I clicked on. I tried deactivating the NewTabURL, in case this was the problem but that was not it.
